Rulings.Base: 1. [FORUM] If the "Black Rose Dragon" was not properly Synchro Summoned initially, you will not be able to Special Summon it with the effect of "Blue Rose Dragon". Example: If the Synchro Summon of "Black Rose Dragon" was negated by "Solemn Judgment", it cannot be Special Summoned from the GY with cards like "Monster Reborn", "Blue Rose Dragon", and "Call of the Haunted".
